sentences.en: A few complex geological environments are discussed in a later section.
sentences.cn: 下一节中还要讨论几种复杂的地质条件.

sentences.en: A variety of geological environments are extrusive or intrusive rocks.
sentences.cn: 不同的地质环境形成喷出岩或侵入岩.
数以亿万年计的地质史

sentences.en: Chapter 16 will be concerned with interpretation and geological applications of the data.
sentences.cn: 第十六章是关于资料的解释及地质应用.

sentences.en: Concentrators in geological sciences elect either geology or geography.
sentences.cn: 主修地质学的学生要选修地质学或地理课程.

sentences.en: From the geological point of view the earth consists of three spheres.
sentences.cn: 从地质学的观点来看,地球由三个圈组成.

sentences.en: Geological data can be preseted as a regularly sampled series.
sentences.cn: 地质数据可以表示有规律的取样数列.

sentences.en: Geological investigations must correctly diagnose a specific soil - like condition.
sentences.cn: 地质调查必须正确地判断出明确的土 状 条件.

sentences.en: He is the founder of the new theory for geological science.
sentences.cn: 他是地质科学新理论的创始者.

sentences.en: Subsequent discoverjes were made by geological mapping and low - level airborne radiometric surveys.
sentences.cn: 地质填图和低空放射性航测又继续探明了一批矿点.

sentences.en: The facies of a modern beach is probably seldom preserved in the geological record.
sentences.cn: 现代海滩的相很少在地质记录上保存下来.

sentences.en: The main advantages are due principally to the lack of interference in geological samples.
sentences.cn: 主要优点在于地质样品不会有干扰因素.

sentences.en: The mines had been closed down following a geological survey.
sentences.cn: 继一次地质调查之后,这些矿井已被关闭了.

sentences.en: The workers skirted the edge of the cliff on a geological survey.
sentences.cn: 工人们沿着崖壁作了一次地质勘察.

sentences.en: With geological maps, books and atlases you can find out all the proven sites of precious minerals.
sentences.cn: 有了地质图、书籍和地图册，你便可以找到所有已探明的珍贵矿藏的位置。

sentences.en: With geological maps, books, and atlases you can find out all the proven sites of precious minerals.
sentences.cn: 有了地质地图、书籍和地图册，你就可以找到所有已探明的珍贵矿藏的位置。
